-Yes! -Yes!
-Leave me alone! -[grunts]

OK, thank you.

Very...

OK.

Uh, I have to avoid you like the plague

Ee-so-ken.

do for... I give up.

translation.it: Ti avverto che il mio soprannome era Oyibo Afro Juju.

translation.en: Never! Why would they call you that?
translation.it: Non ci credo! Perché ti chiamavano così?

translation.en: The kids of the Nigerians
translation.it: Alle feste di compleanno dei figli dei nigeriani

translation.en: who worked at the High Commission
-used to have birthday parties. -OK.
translation.it: che lavoravano all'Alto Commissariato, suonavano puntualmente Shina Peters

translation.en: Every time, without fail, they used to play Shina Peters
and have these dance competitions.
translation.it: e c'erano queste gare di ballo.

translation.en: I don't know how, but I just kept winning every time.
translation.it: E non so come, ma io le vincevo sempre.

translation.en: -[laughs] -I think they felt sorry for me.
-Oh wow, really? You kept winning? -Yeah.
Oh, I have to see this then. Excuse me.
What? What are you doing?
I want you to dance for me. I want you to show me the moves.
-You want me to dance for you? -Yeah!
translation.it: - Vuoi che balli per te? - Sì.

translation.en: Is it every day you see oyibo afro juju?
translation.it: Non lo vedi tutti i giorni, un Oyibo Afro Juju.

translation.en: So please.
Fine, fine. But prepare to be amazed.
translation.it: - Quindi, prego. - E va bene. Ma preparati a stupirti.

translation.en: Take it away.
Huh? OK, what is, what is that?
No, no, no. Kevin, you really have to stop!
Oh, you can't stop this. You can't stop these moves, no.
translation.it: Troppo tardi, non posso. - Non riesco a fermarmi. - Ti prego.

translation.en: Please, please, please...
translation.it: - Non riesco a fermarmi. - Ti prego.

translation.en: And then she said, "Are they sharing children in the university?"
translation.it: E poi ha detto... "distribuiscono figli all'università?"

translation.en: No, she didn't.
Yes, she did. My mother...
So it doesn't matter what a woman accomplishes in her life.
translation.it: I successi professionali di una donna non contano per lei.

translation.en: She could find a cure for AIDS,
translation.it: Fosse anche la cura per l'AIDS.

translation.en: she could find a cure for world hunger, even cancer,
translation.it: O la soluzione alla fame nel mondo. O la cura per il cancro.

translation.en: and it still wouldn't matter
unless she was able to bag herself a husband and pop out some babies.
translation.it: se quella donna non ha trovato un marito e sfornato dei bambini.

translation.en: I know what you mean. The pressure here to get married is massive.
translation.it: La pressione sociale a sposarsi è molto forte qui.

translation.en: How you're perceived is so important.
I remember, in university, we had a friend,
she got married right out of university and then had a child shortly after.
translation.it: Si è sposata subito dopo la laurea e ha partorito poco dopo.

translation.en: She must've been like, what, 22 years old?
And then while we were out clubbing and having boyfriends
translation.it: E mentre noi andavamo a ballare, uscivamo con i ragazzi

translation.en: and just being kids, she was at home changing diapers.
translation.it: e vivevamo la nostra giovinezza, lei cambiava pannolini.

translation.en: So I bet she must have felt like a pariah.
translation.it: E so che si sentiva un'emarginata.

translation.en: Eventually, more and more friends started pairing off
translation.it: Nel tempo, le amiche si sono fidanzate, si sono sposate e hanno avuto figli.

translation.en: and getting married and having their own children and...
translation.it: le amiche si sono fidanzate, si sono sposate e hanno avuto figli.

translation.en: before you know it, it just hits you,
translation.it: E in men che non si dica, hai 34 anni

translation.en: at 34, you're the only single woman at your school's reunion.
translation.it: E in men che non si dica, hai 34 anni e sei l'unica single alle rimpatriate di classe.

translation.en: It's like one minute, you're a star student,
translation.it: E da studentessa brillante che eri all'università,

translation.en: and then the next minute, you feel like you failed at some life exams.
translation.it: in un attimo, hai la sensazione di aver fallito nella vita.

translation.en: Wow, oh my goodness! Is that the time? Oh wow.
-Sorry... -Yeah...
I didn't mean to keep you up. No, it's OK. It's fine.
translation.it: - Non volevo tenerti sveglia. - Non fa niente.

translation.en: I thoroughly enjoyed myself.
I did too, actually.
translation.it: - Anche per me, in effetti. - Bene.

translation.en: That's good. Well, thank you for the earring and your terrible dance moves.
translation.it: Grazie per l'orecchino e per l'osceno saggio di danza.

translation.en: You're welcome. Hey, listen, I just wanted to say,
translation.it: Non c'è di che. Volevo solo dirti che non devi preoccuparti.

translation.en: you have nothing to worry about.
translation.it: Volevo solo dirti che non devi preoccuparti.

translation.en: You are an incredibly beautiful woman,
and you will find love... in your own time.
translation.it: e troverai l'amore... quando sarai pronta.

translation.en: -[sentimental music playing] -I hope so. Thanks, Kevin.
You're welcome.
-OK, good night. -Good night.
Are you ready?
[Isoken] This waxing thing, I'm not sure it's worth the pain.
translation.it: Questa storia della ceretta, non credo ne valga la pena.

translation.en: I don't know about you, but it is working for me.
translation.it: Non so per te, ma per me ne vale la pena.

translation.en: Chuks cannot get enough of me!
translation.it: Chuks non si stacca un attimo da me.

translation.en: -So you like it when he does that? -Like it? Girl, I love it...
translation.it: - Quindi ti piace quando te lo fa? - Se mi piace? Potrei stare lì tutta la notte.

translation.en: Oh please, I beg, enough of this gist.
translation.it: Vi prego, basta con questi discorsi.

translation.en: I can't believe I'm the only one here without a man.
translation.it: Sono l'unica ad essere rimasta senza uomo.

translation.en: -Like seriously? -Speak for yourself.
translation.it: - Non si spiega! - Parla per te.

translation.en: Some people even have two.
-What? -Mm-hm.
Yeah, a white boy.
OK, guys, I'm sorry, but...
I don't know how to feel about Nigerian girls that date white guys.
translation.it: Non so cosa pensare delle nigeriane che escono con gli oyibo.

translation.en: It just comes off as,
I don't know, like there's an inferiority complex.
translation.it: una specie di complesso di inferiorità.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I feel you. My cousin calls it the post-colonial blues.
translation.it: Ti capisco. Mio cugino la chiama depressione post-coloniale.

translation.en: I mean, the way we Africans think everything white is better...
translation.it: Il fatto che noi africani pensiamo che oyibo sia meglio.

translation.en: That's why we struggle with all these foreign accents.
translation.it: E vogliamo imitare il loro accento.

translation.en: Exactly!
Please, Joke calm down. What is it?
translation.it: Ti prego. Joke, calmati. Che ti prende?

translation.en: If you felt that strongly, why did you go to school in England?
translation.it: Se oyibo non ti piace, perché hai studiato a Londra?

translation.en: Please ask her!
Besides, having light skinned, half-caste kids won't be bad at all, you know?
translation.it: E poi, i bambini mezzosangue con la pelle chiara sono belli.

translation.en: You see what I mean? And by the way, it's mixed race.
translation.it: Vedi a cosa mi riferisco? E comunque, si dice di "etnia mista".

translation.en: -Mixed race. -Whatever.
translation.it: E comunque, si dice di "etnia mista". Ragazze, rilassatevi.

translation.en: You guys just relax, OK?
I'm not dating him. We're just friends. Besides if I was, you guys are terrible.
translation.it: Non ci sto uscendo. Siamo solo amici. Ma se anche fosse... voi siete perfide, ve lo dico.

translation.en: So, so wait, wait, wait, you're saying you do not like him?
translation.it: Va bene, aspetta. Quindi non ti piace?

translation.en: [sighs] I don't know...
You know, if there ever was a checklist of what a great guy would be,
translation.it: Saze ha tutte le qualità che una donna cerca in un uomo.

translation.en: Saze would tick every box.
translation.it: che una donna cerca in un uomo.

translation.en: -Ah, ah, one person! -Oh.
-Handsome, check. -Great.
Successful, check. Ambitious, check.
translation.it: Successo, ce l'ha. Ambizione, ha pure quella.

translation.en: -Great kisser, check, check, check, check! -Really?
So wetin you come dey find again, girl?
I know, but Kevin...
-[sighs loudly] -I just feel like I can be myself.
translation.it: con lui sento di poter essere me stessa.

translation.en: No need to pretend or try to be someone else.
Maybe because there's no pressure to be perfect around him.
translation.it: Forse perché non senti - di dover essere perfetta con lui. - No, ascolta.

translation.en: No. Wait, wait, listen. Look at me, girl.
translation.it: - di dover essere perfetta con lui. - No, ascolta. Guardami, ragazza.

translation.en: All these butterflies you're feeling for Kevin...
translation.it: Kevin ti dà il batticuore, ma con quello...

translation.en: [smacks lips] Will butterflies pay bills?
Answer!
Look, Saze is the real deal.
Saze knows what he wants, you know,
knows where he's going in life, and it aligns with yours, right?
translation.it: Ha degli obiettivi che combaciano con i tuoi, no?

translation.en: I guess...
Your marriage should be a union of two great Edo families.
translation.it: Il vostro matrimonio sarà l'unione di due grandi famiglie Edo.

translation.en: The wedding outfits will look great.
I can imagine Flavor and Olamide performing at the wedding!
translation.it: Flavour e Olamide si esibiranno al vostro matrimonio.

translation.en: -Babes, what else do you what? -Agnes!
Weddings are not concerts!
Exactly! And marriages are not business mergers.
But wait, wait, who says you have to decide now?
translation.it: Ma chi dice che devi decidere adesso?

translation.en: You can date both of them. Men have done worse.
translation.it: Puoi uscire con entrambi. - Gli uomini fanno di peggio. - Ma è tradire.

translation.en: But isn't it cheating?
translation.it: - Gli uomini fanno di peggio. - Ma è tradire.

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no!
So long as you're not sleeping with Kevin as well, it's dating.
translation.it: Se non vai a letto con nessuno, ci stai solo uscendo.

translation.en: -Mm. -There's a difference.
Really?
Isoken, I'm sure you know your mum would flip when she hears this.
translation.it: Isoken. Tua madre sbroccherà quando lo saprà.

translation.en: -Oh please, please... -I beg, please,
enjoy your life! Do it for all the girls around the world!
translation.it: goditela finché dura! Fallo per le ragazze di tutto il mondo!

translation.en: I see you want to live vicariously through me, right?
translation.it: Vuoi vivere la vita attraverso la mia.

translation.en: Listen, if I had my own way, I would even date five!
Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday...
-Kukua! -Girls, they hustle!
translation.it: - Lunedì, martedì, mercoledì, giovedì... - Kukua! La fila!

translation.en: -Kukua! -Believe me, you should be there!
-Just saying. -Yeah, it's really cool, just to be out.
translation.it: - Esatto. - Sì! È bello stare all'aria aperta.

translation.en: Well, if my truck isn't gonna get us into the market, we're gonna have to use one of these.
translation.it: Se in auto non si può, dovremo prendere uno di questi.

translation.en: What? You this white boy! Don't get me lost in Lagos!
translation.it: Che? Ehi, bianco! Non confondermi nella mia città!

translation.en: I've never ridden one of these.
What? You're the one who wanted to go shopping.
How do you even know these places?
Your Nigerian passport should be taken away from you.
[Isoken] Oh my God!
Add more, add more, it's for your daddy.
translation.it: Un altro po', per tuo padre.

translation.en: My dear, pass me a napkin, please.
Sis, are you sure you don't need help?
So I heard you raised three million dollars for your company.
translation.it: Hai raccolto tre milioni per la tua società?

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
So you see, I'm into oil and gas as well.
translation.it: Sai... anche a me interessa il petrolifero.

translation.en: [in Igbo] What did you say?
No, Mummy, he means OYEL.
Is it not so OYEL?
What now? Can't a young man expand his hustle?
translation.it: Un uomo non può avere ambizioni?

translation.en: It's all right. You can come see me anytime.
translation.it: Tranquillo. Vieni a trovarmi quando vuoi.

translation.en: Isoken's family is my family.
translation.it: La famiglia di Isoken è la mia.

translation.en: Speaking of family...
I am assuming that those are your intentions towards my daughter.
translation.it: immagino che tu voglia mettere su famiglia con Isoken.

translation.en: Father...
Are we really going to have the discussion on intentions? Really?
translation.it: Vogliamo fare questa conversazione proprio ora? Davvero?

translation.en: Is it too soon to ask?
Or doesn't the young man have a plan?
translation.it: O per caso il giovane non ha intenzioni serie?

translation.en: Yes, sir, I do.
I was raised by highly ambitious and hardworking parents
translation.it: I miei genitori sono ambiziosi e laboriosi

translation.en: who taught us to go after whatever we want in life.
translation.it: e mi hanno insegnato a lottare per i miei obiettivi.

translation.en: And I recognize those same ambitions in Isoken.
translation.it: E riconosco le stesse ambizioni in Isoken.

translation.en: That's what I'm most attracted to in her.
translation.it: Ed è ciò che più mi attrae di lei.

translation.en: So I believe I can build a great future with Isoken behind me.
translation.it: Quindi credo... che farò grandi cose con lei a coprirmi le spalle.

translation.en: More chicken anyone? There's still a bit here.
translation.it: Volete dell'altro pollo? Ce n'è ancora un po'.

translation.en: Oh, nice. They got some new stuff.
translation.it: Bello. - Hanno roba nuova. - Espongono spesso cose nuove.

translation.en: That reminds me of Oshuti.
-You've got a good eye. -Mm-hm, I know.
-Nice. -Wow. This is just gorgeous.
What does it strike up for you?
translation.it: Cosa ti ha colpito di più?

translation.en: Hm. What I'm getting is lover's embrace.
-Quite apt, hm? -Yes.
♪ ...To keep my feet planted On the ground ♪
translation.it: Guarda quello. Guarda l'espressione di lei. Così intensa.

translation.en: ♪ Let me make this clear I do not care for planetary motions ♪
translation.it: Questo è uno dei miei preferiti. Oh, mio Dio.

translation.en: So, um... are you doing anything tomorrow for your birthday?
translation.it: Quindi... festeggerai il tuo compleanno domani?

translation.en: Absolutely not!
Why not?
I'm turning 35! Thirty-five!
I remember when I was 18, and now, I'm gonna be 35.
translation.it: Sembra ieri che ne avevo 18, e ora ne ho già 35.

translation.en: So I don't need any more reminders that I'm five away from 40, OK?
translation.it: Non voglio niente che mi ricordi che fra 5 anni ne avrò 40.

translation.en: I already have this to deal with and then I have these bags under...
translation.it: Devo già sopportare questo e le borse sotto...

translation.en: -Come on. -See, see, seriously like see, here...
-You're beautiful. -Look. It's terrible, like...
-I'm sorry, I can't, I can't... -What's wrong?
Isoken, wait!
Surprise!
Happy birthday!
[clears throat] Hey, Yinka... Yes?
Hey, um, I just wanted to know if you, like, wanted anything to drink, like juice or something?
translation.it: Vuoi che ti prenda del succo di frutta o qualcos'altro?

translation.en: Ifeanyi, leave me alone, please.
Can't you see I'm busy?
translation.it: Non vedi che ho da fare?

translation.en: Look, I feel like I need an extra two hours of sleep
translation.it: Avrei bisogno di farmi due ore di sonno.

translation.en: because soon I'll be a zombie.
translation.it: Tra un po' sembrerò uno zombie.

translation.en: Yes, so my brother, enjoy it while it lasts.
I love my little man, but sometimes I just want
translation.it: Adoro il mio ometto, ma a volte lo strattonerei

translation.en: to grab him and shake him and ask him what is really wrong.
translation.it: Adoro il mio ometto, ma a volte lo strattonerei e gli chiederei "che c'è, ora?"

translation.en: -Aw. -No, no, don't do that.
Yeah, I can't wait.
My nose is expanding by the day
translation.it: Il mio naso è sempre più grosso

translation.en: and everyone lied about that pregnancy glow.
translation.it: e che la gravidanza renda più belle è una bugia.

translation.en: -Baby, you lied. -Baby, come on...
Have you seen the video that Osato and her husband sent you? Oh no, I haven't! Aw!
translation.it: - Hai visto il video di Osato e il marito? - No.

translation.en: It's so cute. I mean they wanted to Skype, but you know it's 3:00 a.m. their time.
translation.it: Volevano parlarti su Skype - ma lì sono le 3. - Già, per il fuso orario.

translation.en: I know, the time difference...
translation.it: - ma lì sono le 3. - Già, per il fuso orario.

translation.en: Hey Auntie, let me...
Come, come. Let me pray for you.
translation.it: - Zia, sto... - Vieni. - Lascia che preghi per te. - Grazie,

translation.en: Auntie, thank you, but let me just give
translation.it: - Lascia che preghi per te. - Grazie, porto il pollo a papà e torno subito.

translation.en: Daddy this chicken, and I'll be right back.
translation.it: porto il pollo a papà e torno subito.

translation.en: I promise. Thank you, Auntie.
Hello... Hi...
-Having a good time? -Happy birthday, darling.
Thank you, honey.
Daddy!
Happy birthday, sweetheart.
Thank you, thank you, Daddy.
You always give the best presents every year.
translation.it: Ogni anno mi fai dei regali bellissimi.

translation.en: Let me tell you a secret: you're my favorite.
translation.it: Ti dirò un segreto... Sei la mia preferita.

translation.en: I already knew that. I won't tell anyone.
translation.it: Lo sapevo già. Non lo dirò a nessuno.

translation.en: Sorry, I didn't realize there was a party.
translation.it: Scusa, non sapevo ci fosse una festa.

translation.en: No, she didn't know. It was all last minute, um...
translation.it: Non lo sapeva. È stata una sorpresa.

translation.en: [inaudible] I'm sorry.
[inaudible] It's OK.
Come in?
Excuse me, everyone! Excuse me!
Can I have your attention please?
[woman] What's going on?
Oh my God! Oh my God! Oh my God! Oh my God!
I know we've only known each other for six months now,
translation.it: So che ci conosciamo solo da sei mesi,

translation.en: but I couldn't have asked to meet a more perfect woman for me
translation.it: ma non avrei potuto chiedere di meglio di una donna come te

translation.en: at a most perfect time in my life.
translation.it: in questo momento della mia vita.

translation.en: I know where I want my life to go and the things I want to accomplish,
translation.it: So cosa voglio ottenere dalla mia vita

translation.en: and you're the woman I want behind me.
translation.it: e voglio te in questo percorso.

translation.en: -Please say you'll marry me? -[crowd gasps]
-Oh, my God! Oh my God... -[indistinct chatter]
-Is that a yes? -[woman] Yes!
[man] Say yes!
-Yes. -Yes.
Yes!
Glory! Glory!
Tell her I said happy birthday.
-[man 1] Congratulations. -[man 2] Congrats, my man.
Congratulations, man. You've done it.
-[man 1] That was smooth. -[man 2] Welcome to the club.
translation.it: - Grazie! - Bravo! - È andato tutto liscio. - Benvenuto nel club.

translation.en: Now listen, this is what we call a ring.
Coming to bed?
Oh yes, I just wanted to, you know,
get a look at some of the presents before coming to bed.
translation.it: dare un'occhiata ai regali, prima di venire.

translation.en: OK.
I'll be right there.
I didn't hear about the engagement.
Really? Since three months,
I've been running up and down trying to organize this wedding.
translation.it: Ho corso su e giù per organizzare il matrimonio.

translation.en: It's been so stressful.
Congratulations, my dear. Ah, so who is the lucky man?
translation.it: Congratulazioni, cara. Chi è il fortunato?

translation.en: Thank you, Auntie. His name is Osaze...
I think I know the Abieyuwa family.
Ah, they are from a good home.
And such a well-brought-up boy.
His business is doing fabulous.
God answers prayers, oh!
Yes, oh! He didn't allow my enemies to laugh at me.
translation.it: Sì! Non ha permesso che i nemici ridessero di me.

translation.en: In fact, Reverend Adeniji himself will be joining them.
translation.it: Non ha permesso che i nemici ridessero di me. E infatti, li sposerà il reverendo Adeniji in persona.

translation.en: -Really? -Yes.
My dear, take a look at these fabrics.
translation.it: Mia cara, dai un'occhiata a questi tessuti.

translation.en: These were the ones we were talking about.
translation.it: Sono quelli di cui avevamo parlato.

translation.en: These designs are common.
I don't want common designs.
I'll have over 1,000 people at that wedding,
translation.it: Avrò più di mille persone a quel matrimonio.

translation.en: and I don't want anybody wearing any design remotely resembling mine.
translation.it: E non voglio che nessuna indossi un abito anche lontanamente simile al mio.

translation.en: I even heard Mama Osaze ordered her own fabrics from Switzerland.
translation.it: Mama Osaze ha ordinato le sue stoffe dalla Svizzera.

translation.en: -From Switzerland? -So, yes, me.
I don't want to be disgraced.
-[laughs] -I trust
translation.it: Ti assicuro che non sfigurerai, cara.

translation.en: you will not be disgraced my dear, don't worry.
translation.it: Ti assicuro che non sfigurerai, cara. E non preoccuparti,

translation.en: I'm going to give you something from that same Switzerland. Ronke!
translation.it: cercherò delle stoffe uniche per te fino in Svizzera. Ronke!

translation.en: [Saze's mother] My dressmaker is expecting you to come in for your measurement. [chuckles]
translation.it: La mia sarta ti aspetta per prenderti le misure.

translation.en: Already she has bought the fabric from Paris.
translation.it: Ha già comprato le stoffe da Paris.

translation.en: All you need to do is go into her studio in Ikoyi to meet her.
translation.it: Tutto quello che devi fare è andare nel suo studio, a Ikoyi.

translation.en: But excuse me, I already have a dress, Ma.
translation.it: Mi scusi, signora, ma ho già un abito.

translation.en: -Your wedding dress? -Yes, Ma.
translation.it: - Un abito da sposa? - Sì, signora.

translation.en: Who?
There's a lady who makes clothes for my mum, -and she made my sister's wedding dress. -[chuckles]
translation.it: Una signora che ha fatto l'abito da sposa di mia sorella.

translation.en: You can use that one later, at the reception.
Joyce is the best.
She's so busy that usually people book her up to six months in advance.
translation.it: La gente la prenota fino a sei mesi prima.

translation.en: In fact, she's making the president's daughter's dress as well.
translation.it: Cucirà anche il vestito della figlia del presidente.

translation.en: I had to pay through my nose,
but if that's what we need to do to get the best, then we must.
translation.it: ma se vogliamo il meglio, dobbiamo essere pronti a spendere.

translation.en: Or what do you think Saze?
Hm? Yeah, whatever you want, Mum.
And this hair, it just won't do.
translation.it: E quei capelli... non vanno bene.

translation.en: You look like a...
how can I put this nicely... like a rural girl.
translation.it: Come posso dirlo senza offendere? Sembri una contadina.

translation.en: Men and their mothers.
translation.it: Gli uomini e le loro madri.

translation.en: Look, there's really not much you can do about it.
So it's totally OK that he just sat there and watched his mum
translation.it: Quindi è normale che se ne stesse lì mentre la madre mi diceva cosa indossare alle mie nozze?

translation.en: tell me what I'm going to wear to my own wedding?
translation.it: mentre la madre mi diceva cosa indossare alle mie nozze?

translation.en: Like, he didn't even stand up to her!
Isoken! He probably didn't just want to get involved.
Hm? Have you seen his mother?
translation.it: Non avrà voluto intromettersi. Hai visto la madre?

translation.en: That woman is intimidating.
Maybe it's just pre-wedding jitters. Everybody gets it, right?
translation.it: Sarà solo un po' di panico prematrimoniale. Succede a tutti, vero?

translation.en: -Right? -Mm, yeah...
Anyway... Oh my God!
translation.it: Ad ogni modo... Oh mio Dio!

translation.en: You look beautiful!
That's an understatement!
-[grunts] -Are you sure?
This is nice.
translation.it: Dite sul serio? È bello. Lo adoro.

translation.en: I love it.
Are you sure it's not too much?
Isoken! Isoken, don't start, oh!
It's a wedding dress. It's supposed to make a statement!

translation.it: Lei è la mia collega, Yinka.

translation.en: My friend, stop that!
What now, eh?
Can't a man feel up on his wife?
translation.it: Un uomo non può toccare sua moglie?

translation.en: Or you don't want baby number two?
translation.it: Non lo vuoi un altro figlio?

translation.en: No, please! My body has not even recovered yet.
translation.it: No, ti prego! Il mio corpo non si è ancora ripreso.

translation.en: Ain't nobody got time for that!
You're not having it, are you?
-Come here! -OK, I got a little time.
translation.it: Vieni qui. - Forse un po' di tempo ce l'ho. - Ora ti riconosco.

translation.en: -That's my girl. -[laughs]
translation.it: - Forse un po' di tempo ce l'ho. - Ora ti riconosco.

translation.en: If you had introduced me to your friend,
translation.it: Se mi avessi presentato la tua amica,

translation.en: this could have been our wedding.
-Uncle, you? Wedding? -Yes.
Please! [chuckles]
Look, I forgive you.
You can make it up to me.
That your friend there, you can introduce her to me, Agnes.
Agnes?
No offence, Uncle Mike, but I think Agnes would eat you for breakfast.
translation.it: Senza offesa, zio Mike, ma Agnes ti mangia a colazione.

translation.en: May I have this dance?
Isoken tells me you're a very good dancer,
translation.it: Isoken mi ha detto che balla bene,

translation.en: so please take it easy on me.
What did he say?
White boy wants to dance with you.
[laughs] Really?
Ye-Isoken, go and dance.
translation.it: - Balla con lui. - Sì, mamma. Vai a ballare.

translation.en: -He wants to dance? -Yes. -Go dance. -What's wrong with you?
-Come on! -Dance.
-[laughs] White boy wants to dance. -["Sekem" playing]
translation.it: Sì, Isoken! - Oyibo vuole ballare! - Dopo di lei.

translation.en: After you.
translation.it: - Oyibo vuole ballare! - Dopo di lei.
